isis.stitle: EC-17 ANTILOCK TRACTION CONTROLLER - OPERATION - TRACTION CONTROL - TRACTION CONTROL AT VEHICLE SPEEDS ABOVE 25 MPH

svcproc.title: TRACTION CONTROL AT VEHICLE SPEEDS ABOVE 25 MPH
svcproc.para: If wheel spin occurs at any speed above 25 mph, the EC-17 will instantly blink the traction dash lamp to advise the driver that a wheel spin is occurring. If the Torque Limiting feature is programmed in, the EC-17 uses its link to the engine control module and sends a signal to reduce engine torque to a level suitable for the available traction.
THE EC-17 WILL NOT SIGNAL THE ATR VALVE TO APPLY THE BRAKES, EVEN SLIGHTLY, AT ANY SPEED ABOVE 25 MPH.
